name.description: Specifies the name of the Azure Relay Namespace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Azure Relay Namespace.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Azure Relay Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku_name.description: The name of the SKU to use. At this time the only supported value is `Standard`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

primary_connection_string.description: The primary connection string for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

secondary_connection_string.description: The secondary connection string for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

primary_key.description: The primary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

secondary_key.description: The secondary access key for the authorization rule `RootManageSharedAccessKey`.

metric_id.description: The Identifier for Azure Insights metrics.

create.description: Used when creating the Relay Namespace.

update.description: Used when updating the Relay Namespace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Relay Namespace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Relay Namespace.
